charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED JUDGMENT changing IMPRISONMENT: 8 monhts (6 months as to count 2 and 2 months as to count 3 to run consecutively with count 2); ORIGINAL SENTENCE DATE: 10/27/98; IMPRISONMENT: 30 months (count 2 - 6 months and count 3 - 24 months to be served consecutively with count 2); SUPERVISED RELEASE: 1 year; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $110.00. See Judgment for specific terms and conditions. Judge Aiken
